InsertEventArgs.summary: this class we allow usea event for a determinate message in this case when insert a person.

PersonaResult.summary: this ImmutableList contains all person in database next to make insert.

ReplicasResult.summary: this Dictionary contains all response for all replicas in the system.

FinalStatus.summary: This Property is useful for know the status for this operation.

InsertEventArgsC.summary: Constructor that allow save a list of person to send the event .
InsertEventArgsC.param: This parameter represent the result for this operation
